item.title: 210723 media management
item.description: [[Theories of Management]] Modern Theories Systems Theory Systems approach looks at 4 major components - Input Transformational Process Output Feedback flowchart a--b(open systems) a--c(closed systems) Contingency Theory also called situational theory

item.title: Culture Cycle
item.description: Culture Counter-culture -> Dominant Culture Counter-culture arises Becomes dominant What’s this called?
